Text: Couldn't find any subtitles, so, the foreign language parts remain opaque for me and made this less enjoyable for me.

No subs for the Japanese parts....which is a lot.  I searched across all the different versions and it appears that none of them have them.  I know basically what is going on, but it is very distracting when there are long scenes that you can't understand at all.

A-9
V-8
It's a decent copy other than no subtitles for foreign languages.  I would expect better for this size of a file, though.
